TextArea

Some common but hard to achieve functions attached to a TextArea element’s prototype.

Summary
TextAreaSome common but hard to achieve functions attached to a TextArea element’s prototype.
Functions
scrollToLineAttempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the specified line at the top.
scrollToCharAttempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the character index (0 based) at the top.
findAttempt to find a pattern in this TextArea and highlight it.
replaceAttempt to replace the current selection with a given text and highlight the replacement.

Functions

scrollToLine

HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.scrollToLine=function(line)

Attempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the specified line at the top.  And yes the w3c is trying to ruin this, just like half the interfaces that allow complex calculation.

Parameter

lineLine to scroll to based upon a 0 index system.

scrollToChar

HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.scrollToChar=function(index)

Attempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the character index (0 based) at the top.  And yes the w3c is trying to ruin this, just like half the interfaces that allow complex calculation.

Parameter

lineLine to scroll to based upon a 0 index system.

find

HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.find=function(pattern,
wrap)

Attempt to find a pattern in this TextArea and highlight it.

Parameter

patternPattern to look for regular expressions will be treated as such, anything else besides undefined will be converted to a String.
wrapif after reaching the end it should try from the top

replace

HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.replace=function(txt)

Attempt to replace the current selection with a given text and highlight the replacement.

Parameter

txtText to put in place of the current selection.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.scrollToLine=function(line)
Attempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the specified line at the top.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.scrollToChar=function(index)
Attempt to move the TextArea’s view port to have the character index (0 based) at the top.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.find=function(pattern,
wrap)
Attempt to find a pattern in this TextArea and highlight it.
HTMLTextAreaElement.prototype.replace=function(txt)
Attempt to replace the current selection with a given text and highlight the replacement.
